trans-unit.source: Test Application Architecture on Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Test Application Architecture on Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Resources for building applications that use Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: Resources for building applications that use Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft publishes series of architectural design patterns to help you compose your own custom designs.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft publishes series of architectural design patterns to help you compose your own custom designs.

trans-unit.source: The patterns are intended to be concise architectural guides which can be composed together in order provide guidance on how to best leverage the Microsoft Azure platform to solve your organization’s business needs.
trans-unit.target: The patterns are intended to be concise architectural guides which can be composed together in order provide guidance on how to best leverage the Microsoft Azure platform to solve your organization’s business needs.

trans-unit.source: A list of Azure Services required to leverage the pattern
trans-unit.target: A list of Azure Services required to leverage the pattern

trans-unit.source: Design limitations or considerations that may impact the pattern
trans-unit.target: Design limitations or considerations that may impact the pattern

trans-unit.source: Key high-level architecture considerations including availability and resiliency, composite SLAs for services used, scale and performance, cost and operational considerations.
trans-unit.target: Key high-level architecture considerations including availability and resiliency, composite SLAs for services used, scale and performance, cost and operational considerations.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft publishes a set of high level architecture blueprints showing how to build specific types of systems which include Mirosoft products and Microsoft Azure services.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft publishes a set of high level architecture blueprints showing how to build specific types of systems which include Mirosoft products and Microsoft Azure services.

trans-unit.source: Each blueprint includes a 2D Visio-based file that you can download and modify, a more colorful 3D PDF file to introduce the blueprint, and a video that walks through the 3D version.
trans-unit.target: Each blueprint includes a 2D Visio-based file that you can download and modify, a more colorful 3D PDF file to introduce the blueprint, and a video that walks through the 3D version.

trans-unit.source: The 2D Blueprint diagrams use the Cloud and Enterprise Symbol Set mentioned below.
trans-unit.target: The 2D Blueprint diagrams use the Cloud and Enterprise Symbol Set mentioned below.

trans-unit.source: The 3D Blueprint PDFs are created in a non-Microsoft tool, but a Visio template is under development.
trans-unit.target: The 3D Blueprint PDFs are created in a non-Microsoft tool, but a Visio template is under development.

trans-unit.source: BETA training video of the template here.
trans-unit.target: BETA training video of the template here.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the Visio 3d Blueprint Template beta, email
trans-unit.target: To obtain the Visio 3d Blueprint Template beta, email

trans-unit.source: Download the Cloud and Enterprise Symbol/Icon set
trans-unit.target: Download the Cloud and Enterprise Symbol/Icon set

trans-unit.source: to create technical materials that describe Azure, Windows Server, SQL Server and other Microsoft products.
trans-unit.target: to create technical materials that describe Azure, Windows Server, SQL Server and other Microsoft products.

trans-unit.source: You can use them in architecture diagrams, training materials, presentations, datasheets, infographics, whitepapers and even 3rd party books if the book trains people to use Microsoft products.
trans-unit.target: You can use them in architecture diagrams, training materials, presentations, datasheets, infographics, whitepapers and even 3rd party books if the book trains people to use Microsoft products.

trans-unit.source: The symbols are in Visio and PNG formats.
trans-unit.target: The symbols are in Visio and PNG formats.

trans-unit.source: Instructions on how to use the PNGs in PowerPoint are included.
trans-unit.target: Instructions on how to use the PNGs in PowerPoint are included.

trans-unit.source: The symbol set ships quarterly and is updated as new services are released.
trans-unit.target: The symbol set ships quarterly and is updated as new services are released.

trans-unit.source: If you want a preview of the newest release, which may include additional Azure services, email
trans-unit.target: If you want a preview of the newest release, which may include additional Azure services, email

trans-unit.source: We’d like to know what you think, so there are instructions for providing feedback in the download.
trans-unit.target: We’d like to know what you think, so there are instructions for providing feedback in the download.

trans-unit.source: If you've used the symbols, fill out the short 5 question
trans-unit.target: If you've used the symbols, fill out the short 5 question

trans-unit.source: or email us at the address above to let us know if they are useful and how you use them.
trans-unit.target: or email us at the address above to let us know if they are useful and how you use them.

trans-unit.source: Additional symbols are available in the
trans-unit.target: Additional symbols are available in the

trans-unit.source: , though they are not optimized for architectural diagrams like the CnE set is.
trans-unit.target: , though they are not optimized for architectural diagrams like the CnE set is.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Patterns and Practices has published the book
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Patterns and Practices has published the book

trans-unit.source: which is available both on MSDN and in PDF download.
trans-unit.target: which is available both on MSDN and in PDF download.

trans-unit.source: There is also a large format poster available which lists all the patterns.
trans-unit.target: There is also a large format poster available which lists all the patterns.

trans-unit.source: Patterns and Practices Cloud Patterns Poster
trans-unit.target: Patterns and Practices Cloud Patterns Poster

trans-unit.source: Microsoft publishes several architecture related posters/infographics.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft publishes several architecture related posters/infographics.
